name: Diamond Rose
description:
Diamond Rose is a short fantasy RPG developed for the NaNoRenO game jam.

STORY

The story follows Van, a promising young craftsman. Fueled only by his passion for crafting, he left his hometown and set out to make it big in the bustling city of Azalea.

He soon realized that passion alone was not enough to survive in the big city. Without fame to his name, no decent customer looked at his wares. Without a decent workshop, he was treated as a common merchant. A month passed and he became just another in the long line of failures.

This all changed when he met a swordswoman who gave him the chance to turn his life around.

FEATURES

  • RPG Battle System
  • Crafting
  • Exploration

TEAM

  • Sendo - Art and Programming
  • Zetsubou - Writer (also the writer and creator of another NaNoRenO 2016 entry: Wander No More)
  • Special thanks to Sam and Abet.

LIST OF KNOWN BUGS

  • Character Side Images (the dialogue image when they speak) are cut off or disappear when rolling back (using PageUp/Down or MouseScroll) and continuing.
  • Click-to-continue indicator not working in fullscreen

CHANGELOG (v1.1/5-8-2016)

  • Added Story Mode. Not a fan of RPGs? Play in this mode!
  • Reworked Casual Mode: Players deal 2x damage, have permanent +20 speed bonus, and 100% monster loot drop rate. Breeze through the game in this mode!
  • Added Run command. Escape unnecessary battles!
  • Added Scrollbars to the Status Screen; no more screen overflow.
  • Added Skill Descriptions in battle
  • Added Status Effect icons
  • Increased 'Fine String' and 'Premium String' drop rate; it's now very easy to get them.
  • Removed unused assets and compressed images, reducing the overall filesize by around 20 MB
  • And various small fixes and improvements
  • Important! Save files from version 1.0 are incompatible with this version due to internal changes. However, the game will save in a different location so the old save files won't be affected.

If you encounter bugs aside from the ones listed above, please report them to sendogfx@gmail.com or comment on this page. Thanks! We hope you enjoy the game!
